snippet: After much frustration — and after receiving many a robocall — a Sears customer asks the Haggler for help in getting the treadmill he ordered online.
abstract: David Segal The Haggler column; Sears customer, after much frustration--and after receiving many robocalls--asks Haggler for help in getting the treadmill he ordered online.
lead_paragraph: After much frustration — and after receiving many a robocall — a Sears customer asks the Haggler for help in getting the treadmill he ordered online.

headline.print_headline: Running in Place, Before the Treadmill Ever Arrived
headline.seo: Running in Circles Over a Treadmill From Sears
headline.main: Running in Place, Before the Treadmill Ever Arrived
